amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, requires the Department of Defense to use renewable energy sources to meet at least 25 percent of its electricity needs by 2025.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 110-151 to require DOD to use renewable energy to meet at least 25% of its electricity needs by 2025, unless the Secretary determines a waiver is in the best interest of DOD.

action.text: Andrews amendment (A018) modified by unanimous consent.
On agreeing to the Andrews amendment (A018) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
